name: Return To Monkee
description:
=============================
On planet Oragua, the leaders of the 4 most influential clans are fighting in a merciless war for total control of the planet.
The Gorillano Mafia, the ingenious Primath, the devout Chimpanzees and the nimble Lemurs are going all-out today.
=============================
Monkeybrawl with your friends in this hotseat multiplayer worms-like game!
Pick one of four playable clans, and send your foes (or allies) flying using your weapons and special abilities! Blow em up, throw em, bless em, and carry em away!

>> 2 to 4 players, local versus game!
>> 4 monkey clans, and 4 stages!

>> Controls :
- A and D* : Horizontal movement
- Space : Jump
- 1 and 2 : Switch weapon
- Shift : Use special ability
- Left mouse button : Hold to charge, release to shoot!
- Enter : Start/end your turn
- Escape : Pause and sound settings
*(Q and D on the French version)

>> Weapons :
- 1 : The Bananazooka : Shoots a banana that explodes on impact, dealing high knockback to monkeys within range. Charge your shot to fire the banana farther!
- 2 : The Appleshotty : Shoots a short-ranged volley of apples that deals direct contact damage. Charge your shot to fire even more apples!
- SHIFT : Special Ability : Each clan has a unique ability! Check their in-game description to learn how to use them.

Programmer : Kadronk (Newgrounds, Twitter)
Game/Level designers : Nicolas Gruszecki, Mathilde Panigatti, Heather Verheyde and Paul Vangilluwen.
Artists : Chloé Hecquefeuille (Artstation, Twitter) and AD (Artstation)

If you're wondering why the game doesn't have music : It was originally made for a private game jam, and used copyrighted music. Needless to say, we had to remove it.
